name: Buy My Extra Books
objective: Book reselling and booking Single page Web Application
features: Single Page Web Application for Reselling Products with 3 types of user authorization
Seller can add, manage and advertise his own products & Buyer have the booking functionalities.
Admin have the seller buyer management functionality and seller verify functionality.
technology: React JS, Node, MongoDB, Express, Context API, Firebase, React-Type Animation

name: Tiffin Bhai
objective: A Review System for Online Delivery & other services
features: Tiffin Bhai Web Application is a Single Page Application with review functionality.
The User have ability to access the functionalities of adding, deleting and modifying their review.
User can also add his/her own services to the Application.
technology: React JS, Node, MongoDB, Express, Context API, Firebase, React-Type Animation

name: Crack-BCS
objective: Single page Course Access Management system Application
features: User can log in via Google and GitHub or personal email
Only Logged-in Users can see Product details & feature products.
User can get premium access and download the course details as PDF.
technology: React JS, Node, MongoDB, Express, Context API, Firebase,vercel
